subject: Re: Inappropriate evp.
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
LOL!  Welcome Mick to the world of earthbound spirits.  They are olost 
and in need of help...  ;)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Mick <micksghosts@...> wrote:
>
> I was cleaning up some evp's last night that I caught in a local 
> cemetery. One of the evp's I swear is calling me a f*****! Is this 
> possible? Has anyone encountered language like this with their evp's?
> 
> Thanks,
> 
> Mick,
